item.description: Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1106; 04:24PM; 7240 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jCrUoh; Sun Valley; FIRE NOW OUT: Large, two story apartment building with smoke showing from one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters entered the offensive mode and quickly extinguished the fire in one unit on the 2nd floor. One patient is being evaluated. The 9-1-1 call was received at 4PM. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E77 RA60 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1002; 03:13PM; 14639 W Friar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VxeLtP; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN:18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the fire unit on the first floor. Additional resources were requested but the knockdown was achieved prior to their arrival. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E39 E81 RA39 T39; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1002; 02:49PM; 14639 W Friar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VxeLtP; Van Nuys; Two story, center hall (over parking) apartment building with smoke showing from one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E39 E81 RA39 T39; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Trapped Vehicle; INC#0565; 10:26PM; Sb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GaLyzg; Granada Hills; Firefighters extricated the adult male patient from the rollover vehicle and is transporting him in critical condition. The 2nd patient (adult female from a different vehicle) declined LAFD transport. Any further questions are referred to CHP Log# 1003. No further details. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 E18 E275 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA91 T75 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0565; 09:49AM; Sb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GaLyzg; Granada Hills; One car roll-over with two patients. One patient is trapped and requires extrication (in at least serious condition) and one patient with non-life threatening injuries. CHP Log# 1003; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 E18 E275 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA91 T75 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Structure Fire, Auto Aid - With Injuries 12/30/2022 INC#0325

item.description: Structure Fire, Auto Aid - With Injuries; INC#0325; 08:31AM; 378 N Electric Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IbEjd2; outside city; LAFD has two paramedic ambulances and one battalion command team assisting at a structure fire in the City of Alhambra. LAFD has been assigned care of two critical patients. Reports on scene of at least three critical patients including one pediatric. The total number of patients is not known (by LAFD). This is a Alhambra Fire Department incident and any questions are referred to that agency. No further details.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District outside city; BC2 RA1 RA47; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#0241; 06:26AM; 425 S Kingsley Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Wy7A5X; Koreatown; FIRE NOW OUT: Firefighters arrived to a three story, modern style apartment building (two stories over parking) with nothing showing. They initiated an investigation and located heavy smoke on the 2nd floor. Fire attack made entry and extinguished the fire in one unit, preventing it from extending and damaging the adjacent units. One adult female from the adjoining unit was evaluated for possible smoke inhalation but has not been transported to the hospital. Cause and $ loss TBD. The 9-1-1 call was received at 6:07AM. No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E13 E211 E226 E229 E26 E29 E6 EM11 RA29 RA52 RA829 T11 T26 T29; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT 12/30/2022 INC#0135

item.description: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT; INC#0135; 03:30AM; 13624 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z2XBYi; Valley Glen; FIRE NOW OUT: Outside fire extended into a one story commercial building (doing business as Sherman Way Marketplace). Additional resources were requested. Firefighters initiated an offensive operation and quickly extinguished the outside fire while crews also made entry into the building. They knocked down the interior fire, preventing it from extending into the attic. There are no injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 3:03AM. No further details.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E290 E39 E81 E90 EM14 RA81 T39 T60 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Engine Response; INC#0968; 03:57PM; 2137 W Fargo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vqoCHf; Echo Park; A delivery van (Mercedes Sprinter) slide down the steep street and is suspended on two wheels (against a tree?). Firefighters stabilized the vehicle and there are no injuries reported. LAFD Heavy Rescue vehicle will be used to bring it back to four wheels on the ground. The 9-1-1 call was received at 3:20PM. No further details.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E20 E220 HR3 RA20 T20; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Cliff, Vehicle; INC#0868; 03:27PM; 9301 Conover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vIzdhb; outside city; Once the patient and the two rescuers were safely hoisted, the weather enroute to the designated trauma center deteriorated and was no longer conducive to air transport. LAFD Air Ops is landing at a nearby helispot and transferring care to the firefighters/paramedics for ground transport to the hospital. No further updates.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E289 E89 E90 E91 EM12 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 HR3 RA74 RA89 RH114 T74 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
